message.content:
I need to identify the specific amount of tax an entity is expected to pay or recover during a reporting period based on the financial statements provided.

Looking at the income statement, I see that there is a line item specifically labeled "Tax Expense" with a value of 27369.63 as of 2024-02-05.

This is corroborated by the balance sheet, which shows "Taxes Payable" with an end amount of 27369.63 as of 2024-02-05.

Additionally, in the cash flow statement, there's an entry "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with the same amount of 27369.63.

Since all three financial statements consistently show the same tax amount, I can confidently identify that the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during this reporting period is 27369.63.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '27369.63'} }
```
